project.name: sabbus
project.description: SuperSabbus for Scala core, builds the scala library and compiler. It can also package it as a simple distribution, tests it for stable bootstrapping and against the Scala test suite. Use PackSabbus to package it for different install management tools such as Sbaz.

target.name: build
target.description: Builds the Scala compiler and library. Executables are in 'build/pack/bin'.

target.name: clean
target.description: Removes binaries of compiler and library. Distributions are untouched.

target.name: test
target.description: Runs test suite and bootstrapping test on Scala compiler and library.

target.name: optimised.test
target.description: Runs test suite and bootstrapping test on the optimised Scala compiler and library.

target.name: docs
target.description: Builds documentation for the Scala library. Scaladoc is in 'build/scaladoc/library'.

target.name: docscomp
target.description: Builds documentation for the Scala compiler and library. Scaladoc is in 'build/scaladoc'.

target.name: docsclean
target.description: Removes generated documentation. Distributions are untouched.

target.name: dist
target.description: Makes a new distribution and tests it. Will remove existing binaries and documentation.

target.name: fastdist
target.description: Makes a new distribution without testing it or removing partially build elements

target.name: distclean
target.description: Removes all distributions. Binaries and documentation are untouched.

target.name: newstarr
target.description: Replaces the Starr compiler and library by one built from current sources and tests it.

fail.message: This target is not available on Windows. Use 'ant newstarrwin' instead.

target.name: newstarrwin
target.description: Creates a new Starr on Windows. Manually execute 'ant locker.clean build' first!

fail.message: This target is only available on Windows. Use 'ant newstarr' instead.

echo.message: CAUTION: Make sure to execute 'ant locker.clean build' prior to calling 'newstarrwin'.

target.name: freshlocker
target.description: Replaces the Locker compiler and library by one built from current sources.

target.name: newlocker
target.description: Unlocks the Locker compiler and library and lets them be updated by Scalac.

target.name: newlibs
target.description: Forces compiler libraries (MSIL) to be rebuilt. Add this target before any other if class file format is incompatible.

target.name: optimised
target.description: Build the compiler and standard library using optimisations, running 'quick'

genman.command: fsc, sbaz, scala, scalac, scaladoc, scalap
